title: One sector the Fed can’t crash
itunes:title: One sector the Fed can’t crash
description: Why the Fed is a bunch of a**holes—and they should all be fired… A billionaire who thinks we’re in for a hard landing… Proof the economy is crashing—and we could see a depression by next year... Why October will be particularly painful for the markets… When will we finally see an end to rate hikes? And one sector that will survive the Fed. In this episode   A billionaire’s advice to the Fed [1:25] All signs point to a depression around the corner [7:40] Prepare for a tough October [16:20] What does the Fed need to see to end rate hikes? [24:05] One sector the Fed can’t crash [35:20]  Enjoyed this episode?
